org.protune.core
Class NegotiationElement

java.lang.Object
  org.protune.core.NegotiationElement

public class NegotiationElement
extends java.lang.Object

As stated in Status, a negotiation state should contain (at least)

  • sent/received FilteredPolicy
  • Notification of performed actions
  • Check testing whether the notifications are (not) reliable
When inserted into a state, such entities are decorated with other information which are meant to support advanced features. At present this additional information includes
  • whether the entity was sent/received
  • when the entity was added to the state
  • the number of the negotiation step during which the entity was added
A NegotiationElement object is a wrapper for these entities providing this additional information.

Author:
jldecoi
